description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget representing a filter screen with options to select criteria such as hair color, religion, ethnicity, height, and weight. It includes UI components like checkboxes, range sliders, and buttons to apply or reset filters. The file interacts with provider-based state management, specifically the FilterProvider and FilterCriteria models.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget serving as the main screen for filtering options with an app bar, body, and bottom action button.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays filtering options such as checkbox groups and range sliders for different criteria.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: Internal state management for _FilterBody, handling initialization and user interactions with filters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for FilterScreen, including app bar, body, and footer button.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filters to default values and shows a confirmation snackbar.

methods.name: _FilterBodyState.initState
methods.description: Initializes the range values for height and weight from the current filter criteria.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the list of filter options, including checkboxes and sliders.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Creates a group of checkboxes for enum options such as HairColor, Religion, and Race.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets the local filter options to default values and shows a snackbar.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names into human-readable labels.
